name: antisemite

a person who is antisemitic (= who hates Jewish people, or is unfair or cruel towards people because they are Jewish): He is known as a poisonous antisemite and historical revisionist. She was an anti-Semite and member of the Nazi party. Related words
antisemitic
antisemitism
